entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High plus 5 except plus 1 along the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 5 except plus 1 along the coast. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. High plus 4 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain changing to rain in the morning then to flurries late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
